Modules

Checkout Views

checkout.views.checkout_view(request)[source]

Handle the checkout process and create an order.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Renders the checkout page or redirects after order creation.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Notes

Uses a temporary mock cart until the real cart is integrated. Stores cart items in the session for receipt generation.

Order Confirmation Views

order_confirmation.views.order_confirmation(request, order_id)[source]
order_confirmation.views.send_confirmation_email(order)[source]
order_confirmation.views.download_receipt(request, order_id)[source]

Generate and return a PDF receipt for an order.

Parameters:

  • request – The HTTP request object.

  • order_id (int) – The ID of the order to generate a receipt for.

Returns:

A PDF file response or an error message if generation fails.

Return type:

HttpResponse
